name: Rasputin's Vengeance
description:
In a futuristic USSR, you must invade a forgotten secret base and rescue a scientist from the immortal hands of Rasputin.

-----------------------------------------------

WASD - move
MOUSE - aim
LEFT CLICK - shoot
RIGHT CLICK - guide the scientist
SHIFT - dash
SPACE BAR - shield

-----------------------------------------------

Downloadable Version for better experience.

Known Bugs: 

- Player spawn on a stuck position;

Unfortunately, an unfinished entry :(

The game is still quite raw, many things are yet to come, but this is how far we managed to get within the deadline.
There is no game over, victory or sounds ... just an initial version of what we envisioned.
We hope to finish this game and publish here in a near future.
Thanks for playing!

Programing - Gustavo EM
Art - Brumop
Game Design - Juliano F
